title: Sarah (Port Phasmatys)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Sarah Corvo is an inhabitant of Port Phasmatys and descendant of the hero Tristan, she is met during the Dragon Slayer II quest. She gives information on the location of the Morytania dragon key piece, which she buried in the swamps to avoid letting the vampyres get it. She was relieved to get rid of the key piece, believing it to be best if it was lost and forgotten.

content:
"Corvo" redirects here. For her ancestor, the famous hero during the Fourth Age who battled against the Dragonkin, see Tristan.
Sarah
Released4 January 2018 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceGhost
LocationPort Phasmatys
QuestDragon Slayer II
GenderFemale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineShe's a bit dead.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID8134

Sarah Corvo is an inhabitant of Port Phasmatys and descendant of the hero Tristan, she is met during the Dragon Slayer II quest. She gives information on the location of the Morytania dragon key piece, which she buried in the swamps to avoid letting the vampyres get it. She was relieved to get rid of the key piece, believing it to be best if it was lost and forgotten.
